name: We Don't Have Cable handpainted on 716Boss
description:
716Boss
100% Superwash Merino
Approx. 225 yards
Needle: 5-7
Colorway: We Don't Have Cable So We Have to Make Our Own Fun
Handpainted: bright blue with splashes of green, magenta, yellow, brilliant blue, and violet on natural yarn 


This colorway was inspired by Buffy the Vampire Slayer. Each yarn in this collection reflects a specific quote from the show. A great gift for any Buffy lover, or keep it for yourself!

Yarns are dyed individually using acid dyes and occasionally food coloring. 


***Please note: Colors of the photo may vary by computer monitor. The photo taken and description are intended to help accurately describe the yarn***

name: Tick Frickin' Tock 716soloII
description:
716soloII
100% Superwash merino
+/- 420 yards
Needle: 1-3
MADE IN THE USA!!!
Colorway:Tick Frickin' Tock
Handpainted: tonal neon acid green 



716soloII is a slightly more rustic version of 716solo, with more yardage and it’s made in America!!! This yarn knits up wonderfully and has a soft and lofty feeling. It pairs well with other singly ply fingering weight yarns and is perfect for accessories, shawls, or baby items!

Yarns are dyed with acid dyes and occasionally food coloring. Please wash separate for first time as excess dye may exhaust. Please be aware colors vary by monitor.

name: 716knit Mini Mixers
description:
A randomly selected group of colorways and varying bases!

Some may be hand painted, HxC Stripes, semi-solids, or splatter dyed! The bases are all fingering to heavy fingering weight, including 716sock, 716twist, and other bases that were samples.

Each Mini Mixer comes with 5 different colors and are at least 30 grams.
